personal.Name: Ibrum Siddiqui
personal.about: Hi i'm a student currently studying in UOWD

Education.history: I started off my education in the UAE, where I studied for the first 9 years, after which I moved to South Africa. I studied there for the next four years in a suburb called dolphin coast outside the city of Durban. I finished my final 2 years of school in UAE as we moved back here in 2020. I joined UOWD at the end of 2021.
Education.primary: Al Nahda, The International School of Choueifat
Education.secondary: The International School of Choueifat, Crawford College North Coast
Education.curriculum: American, SABIS, IEB and finally IB
